DOC.brief_summary: The study purpose examine influence INTERCOAT prevention intra-uterine adhesion formation hysteroscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency INTERCOAT ( Oxiplex/AP Gel ) Preventing Intrauterine Adhesion Formation Hysteroscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age 18 50 year Must able understand , read sign consent form Signs infection upon admission Ongoing pregnancy Carcinoma uterus cervix Recurrent PID Women admit endometrial ablation Women give birth 6 week ago Women participate another study
